v.v: I will sing of covenant faithfulness and justice;
I will walk in the way of integrity.
I will not put wrongdoing before my eyes;
I will destroy whoever secretly slanders his neighbor.
I will look to the faithful of the land to sit at my side.
Deceitful people will not remain within my house;
Morning by morning I will destroy all the wicked from the land;

v: to you, Yahweh, I will sing praises.
Oh, when will you come to me?
I will walk with integrity within my house.
it will not cling to me.
I am not loyal to evil.
I will not tolerate anyone who has a proud demeanor and an arrogant attitude.
Those who walk in the way of integrity may serve me.
liars will not be welcome before my eyes.
I will remove all evildoers from the city of Yahweh.
